ruleBookContent:
<js>
try{
eval(String(result.match(/eval.*/)));
var res = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var id = res.select(".readerContainer").attr("data-id");
    var b64 = String(ycy.atob(ycy.toBytes(__c0rst96)));
    var arr = [
    "c21raHkyNTg=",
    "c21rZDk1ZnY=",
    "bWQ0OTY5NTI=",
    "Y2Rjc2R3cQ==",
    "dmJmc2EyNTY=",
    "Y2F3ZjE1MWM=",
    "Y2Q1NmN2ZGE=",
    "OGtpaG50OQ==",
    "ZHNvMTV0bG8=",
    "NWtvNnBsaHk="
];
    var str = String(ycy.atob(ycy.toBytes(arr[id])));
    var newdata = "";
    for (var i = 0; i < b64.length; i++) {
        var num = i % str.length;
        newdata += String.fromCharCode(b64.charCodeAt(i) ^ str.charCodeAt(num));
    }
JSON.parse(ycy.atob(ycy.toBytes(newdata)));
} catch (err) {
    ycy.toast(err.toString());
}
</js>
ruleChapterList:
<js>
try {
    var list = [];
    if ( result.includes("更多话点这里") ) {
        var cid = java.get("id");
        var postUrl = "http://rumanhua2.com/morechapter";
        var json = java.postForm(postUrl, "id=" + cid);
        var data = JSON.parse(json).data;
        
        list = data.map( x => ({
                name: x.chaptername,
                url: cid + "/" + x.chapterid + ".html"
        }));
    }

    var res = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
    var arr = res.select(".chaplist-box a").toArray();

    var items = arr.map( x => ({
            name: x.text(),
            url: x.attr("href")
    }));

    items.concat(list).reverse();

} catch (err) {
    ycy.toast(err.toString());
}
</js>
